mapper.insert: INSERT INTO toy2.trip (travel_id, transportation, startpoint, endpoint, departure_time, arrival_time) VALUES (#{travel_id}, #{transportation}, #{startpoint}, #{endpoint}, #{departureTime}, #{arrivalTime})
